forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow this morning, becoming all snow for the afternoon. High 4C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this morning turning to all snow for the afternoon. High 39F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this evening will give way to lingering snow showers late. Low -2C. SSW winds shifting to ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this evening will give way to lingering snow showers late. Low 28F. SSW winds shifting to ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain...mixing with snow in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning rain followed by a mix of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with snow, heavy at times. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulation of 30cm or more. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow will be heavy at times along with gusty winds. Low near 35F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulation of a foot or more. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High 4C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. High 39F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 26F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. High 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 19F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low -6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low around 20F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
